title: Rhode Island State Income Tax Calculator

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Let taxable income be T, bracket thresholds be a₁ and a₂, and rates be r₁, r₂, r₃ (expressed as decimals). Piecewise tax function: TAX(T) = \begin{cases} r_1 \cdot T, & 0 \le T \le a_1 \\ r_1 \cdot a_1 + r_2 \cdot (T - a_1), & a_1 < T \le a_2 \\ r_1 \cdot a_1 + r_2 \cdot (a_2 - a_1) + r_3 \cdot (T - a_2), & T > a_2 \end{cases} Effective rate: \text{EffRate} = \dfrac{\text{TAX}(T)}{T} \quad (\text{defined as } 0 \text{ when } T=0) Marginal rate: \text{MargRate} = \begin{cases} r_1, & 0 \le T \le a_1 \\ r_2, & a_1 < T \le a_2 \\ r_3, & T > a_2 \end{cases}

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
